introduction: My name is Aleksander Fret and I'm Software Developer. Currently I'm focused on technologies: JavaScript, React, Redux, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, CSS, SASS, HTML. I also have some experience with PHP and MySQL. Moreover I'm Graphic Designer (Adobe, Corel).

When I have free time, I split it between various hobbies: web technologies, playing the guitar, listening to the music, board games (i.a. developing my own version of Talisman), mountain trips. And what brings you here? I invite you to contact and cooperation.
